name: employee-payroll-app
description: Employee Payroll and Attendance Management System

scripts.prepare:www: mkdir -p www && cp index.html www/ && cp -r pages www/ && cp -r css www/ && cp -r js www/
scripts.cap:add:android: npm run prepare:www && npx cap add android
scripts.cap:copy: npm run prepare:www && npx cap copy android
scripts.cap:sync: npm run prepare:www && npx cap sync android
scripts.build:apk: npm run cap:sync && npm run cap:open

author: Company Team
